item.title: By: jerome
item.dc:creator: jerome
item.description: thanks Enrico! I'm looking forward to see what they came up with for MC2. I kind of got as far as understanding what had happened and when but not who and what for. maybe 2012...
item.content:encoded: thanks Enrico! I’m looking forward to see what they came up with for MC2. I kind of got as far as understanding what had happened and when but not who and what for. maybe 2012…

item.title: By: Enrico Bertini
item.dc:creator: Enrico Bertini
item.description: Hi Jerome, great to see you finally made it! I love your neat and clean interface. Your solution and ours have many similarities, I am looking forward to show you what we did. I monitored the whole set of challenges from my students and thing MC1 was by far the nicest one. You did not miss much by focusing on this one. The more I see the results of the VAST Challenges the more I convince myself this is the way to go.
item.content:encoded: Hi Jerome, great to see you finally made it! I love your neat and clean interface. Your solution and ours have many similarities, I am looking forward to show you what we did. I monitored the whole set of challenges from my students and thing MC1 was by far the nicest one. You did not miss much by focusing on this one. The more I see the results of the VAST Challenges the more I convince myself this is the way to go.
